pkgmetadata.longdescription: Read and Manipulate Camera Trap Data Packages // Read and manipulate Camera Trap Data Packages ('Camtrap DP'). 'Camtrap DP' (https://camtrap-dp.tdwg.org) is a data exchange format for camera trap data. With 'camtrapdp' you can read, filter and transform data (including to Darwin Core) before further analysis in e.g. 'camtraptor' or 'camtrapR'.
